attributes.action: start showing Prison Officers that they are valued for the professionalism shown under increasingly stressfull and dangerous conditions while doing their jobs within prisons by giving them an above inflation pay rise instead of a below inflation pay cut.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This year, the Prison Service values it's longest serving members by offering them a 0% pay rise while all other taxes continue rising year on year.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "start showing Prison Officers that they are valued for the professionalism shown under increasingly stressfull and dangerous conditions while doing their jobs within prisons by giving them an above inflation pay rise instead of a below inflation pay cut."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13767.asp

Prime Minister's Office
